name: royalist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who supports a ruling king or queen or who believes that a king or queen should rule their country: Sophie's father had always been an ardent royalist. Royalists wanted former king Zahir Shah to return as a unifying head of state. Compare
monarchist
More examplesFewer examplesHe remains a staunch royalist.French royalists launched ceremonies to bury the heart of Louis XVII, the boy king who died in prison in 1795. The new Assembly was mainly composed of conservatives, royalists and moderate republicans.
